speaker: Vlad Iliescu
title: How to Draw Anything with Azure AI and Stable Diffusion
description:
The AI Show is moving to Mondays! We'll stream every Monday at 8:30 am so that we are more accessible for our global audience. On the first show of our new schedule, Microsoft MVP, Vlad Iliescu, joins Seth Juarez to demo how to draw anything with Azure AI and Stable Diffusion. 

Chapters:
00:00 Episode begins
00:16 Welcome to the AI Show
00:26 Welcome Microsoft, MVP, Vlad Iliescu
00:53 What is Stable Diffusion
02:58 Challenges of running Stable Diffusion
04:11 Stable Diffusion demo begins
08:10 Inside the Azure ML Studio 
13:01 How does it all work
15:27 In summary
16:09 Learn more
17:09 Stable Diffusion in VS Code
20:01 Where the images are stored
23:28 Wrap
